verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Heavenly Father, I appreciate you,
Heavenly Father, I appreciate you,
I love you, adore you,
I bow down before you,
Heavenly Father, I appreciate you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit You're a comfort to me
Holy Spirit You're a comfort to me
You lead me, You guide me,
You're dwelling inside me
Holy Spirit You're a comfort to me.
